thread.title: Janice Pilkenton
thread.title_full: Insight Loans reviewed by Janice Pilkenton

author: Janice Pilkenton
title: Janice Pilkenton
text: Once again, Chad and Insight Loans gets an A+. We worked with him back in May of 2016 to purchase a new home and then we worked with him again a month ago to refinance at a lower interest rate. The process was flawless and would highly recommend him and Insight Loans.
